title: Keycloak 23.0.3 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Enable concurrent remote operations for Infinispan storage   BUGS   * Mapper Option "Add to access token" Toggled Off Despite Claim Added to Token    admin/ui  * GH Actions -> Keycloak CI -> MSSQL docker images fails during startup ci  * CIBA and PAR are broken since 23.0.0 (NPE) when using http protocol oidc  * Warning "Event object wasn't available in remote cache" when using remote    store  * Failed to find theme resources, using built-in themes when accessing account    console account/ui
